        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

</a></div><div style="clear:both;"></div></div><div><sup>Sponsored</sup></div></div><div class="cell show-for-medium medium-6" style="padding: 0.6rem;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="88836" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="88836" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.30</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="4653">4,653</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="499"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Le Beau Paradise Garden</b> by <b>Jean Paul Gaultier</b> is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. <b>Le Beau Paradise Garden</b> was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Green Notes, Watery Notes, Mint and Ginger; middle notes are Coconut, Fig and Salt; base notes are Tonka Bean and Sandalwood. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Drawing inspiration from the Autumn/Winter fashion collection of 2010-2011, imagine a lush, enchanting garden named "Le Beau Paradise Garden" and "La Belle Paradise," a haven of intense delights and fervent desires.</p>

<p>Picture a bottle of striking beauty: an emerald-green glass ornately embroidered with a vibrant vine leaf, boasting exquisite, high-fashion details. This alluring, unclothed bottle is impossible to overlook, inviting you to succumb to its charm.</p>

<p>This bottle is a masterpiece, unforgettable in its presence. It's like a tropical beacon, with a Couture-styled embroidered vine leaf artfully obscuring a secret garden where the naked, emerald-green bottle resides. Its magnetic allure draws you into the depths of a hypnotizing and sensuous masculine scent, both mysterious and compelling.</p>

<p>This fragrance is a woody, green aquatic symphony crafted by Quentin Bisch. It encapsulates the heavenly essence of a tropical paradise, replete with radiant flowers and alluring aromas directly from the Garden of Gaultier. The scent intertwines fresh, salty coconut with green fig and the warmth of sandalwood. Accents of spicy ginger, refreshing mint, and sun-warmed Tonka bean add to the fragrance's green aquatic and woody notes, perfectly embodying the passion of the vigorous men who embrace it.</p>

<p>LE BEAU PARADISE GARDEN will be available as 75ml and 125ml Eau de Parum.</p>

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2370918" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2370918" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="swagswag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2114435"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2114435.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="swagswag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2370918ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2370918" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2114435">swagswag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733348407" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smooth and green-watery coconut from the first spray all the way to the drydown. Very easy and pleasing wear with 8+ hours of longetivity on skin and definitely more than a day on clothes. Projects great in the first hours along with a decent sillage. I cant seem to notice any saltiness as per other reviews, but if I keep smelling it over and over I think I can get slight hints of a pleasant ginger and mild mint that goes along great with the overpowering coconut note. Mass likable and a safe blind for a young guy, too youthful for older men. Great to wear on cooler summer days. I think you can make a few people choke if you put this on during a melting hot day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2370918"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2370918#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2370825" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Wrinkled my nose but would like to smell this on a man.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2370825"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2370825#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2369072" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2369072" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Daddymarre"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2323544"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2323544.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Daddymarre" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Emporio-Armani-Stronger-With-You-Absolutely-64501.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64501.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Absolutely"title="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Absolutely"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2369072ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2369072" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2323544">Daddymarre</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-03"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733223278" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Jean paul gaultier has realesed a new fregrance in 2024 Le Beau Paradise Garden. It's mostly a summer fregrance but i think that it suits every season. It's a quite very Fresh fegrance but in the fregrance you get green, coconut, vanilla, sweet, aquatic, woody and fruity notes. I think that this fregrance is very good in my opinion. It's a good price here in Europe but in Us this can cost about 140 dollars. I think that 12+ can already wear this, but i think you wear it from the age 12-25.<br />
Buy this fregrance if you want to smell like a fresh coconut in the summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2369072"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2369072#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2368263" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2364655" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gorkemaksy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1399532"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1399532.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gorkemaksy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Ange-ou-Demon-701.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.701.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ange ou Demon"title="Ange ou Demon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2364655ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2364655" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1399532">gorkemaksy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-29">11/29/24 00:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Even though i didnt like the scent enough to buy a full bottle , I just want to have this bottle in my collection.... That's why i hate Jean Paul Gaultier. Their bottles are f#cking amazing :D</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2364655"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2364655#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2364408" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2364408" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="C0lewastaken"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2334981"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="C0lewastaken" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2364408ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2364408" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2334981">C0lewastaken</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-28">11/28/24 16:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Best youthful scent ever. Icl people only mad bc they cant pull it off. It is green notes + Lots of coconut with a slight bit of salty and sweetness. Last days on clothes and 10 hours on skin arm length projection absolutely love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2364408"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2364408#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2363309" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; There's definitely a coconut and fig vibe,but what I like about it is that the florals are subtle, like a hint of a garden off an ocean breeze. Where it lacks is it's longevity. It's gone before you can really enjoy it, and whatever is left of a skin scent is even weaker. You can spray it on your clothes, but honestly I would love a EDP of this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2362519"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2362519#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2361732" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2356986" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Justinroberts42"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2316007"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Justinroberts42" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2356986ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2356986" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2316007">Justinroberts42</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-21">11/21/24 18:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really love this stuff. Paradise garden is a perfect summer fragrance in my opinion. Its got a nice mix of some green and watery elements combined with that tropical pina colada vibe that is so great from this line. You can wear it everyday in the heat, to go out in the summer, and just for a lot of everyday things. Its got a very Tropical feel that just takes you to the beach or to a vacation or a moment that you enjoy with peers.  This ones tied with le beau le parfum as my favorites from the line. Longevity is crazy good and the projection is strong as well. This will get you compliments. Overall 8.8/10 very good</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2356986"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2356986#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2356693" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2356693" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cphideout"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2254906"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cphideout" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2356693ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2356693" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2254906">cphideout</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-21">11/21/24 12:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The coconut note is extremely heavy in this, I feel like Le Beau is more balanced &amp; a better fragrance overall.<br />
<br />
This is definitely overhyped</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2356693"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2356693#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2355185" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2355185" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfumer5501833fan3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2198755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfumer5501833fan3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2355185ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2355185" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2198755">perfumer5501833fan3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-20">11/20/24 05:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Extremely synthetic. Can smell like plastic to some noses</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2355185"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2355185#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351981" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2351981" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BowTieBeau"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205713"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2205713.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BowTieBeau" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2351981ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2351981" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205713">BowTieBeau</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 09:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A beautifully refined version of Le Beau. The coconut note (which I personally found a little irritating in the aforementioned) has been toned down and masked with minty goodness, turning this into what I'm adamant that Le Beau should have been like. I will not buy this however as it's not my type of scent, but I will recommend it to anybody - truly a scent you could not go wrong with.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; <br />
Smells nice, but i expect far more from this considering everyone and their mother keeps blabbering about "monster projection and performance".<br />
<br />
6/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2351528"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2351528#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349749" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I searched for it nearly EVERYWHERE in my country and could not find it... Then I struck gold on my trip to neighboring country and found this beauty to my collection. It has definitely got the same kind of tropical coconut as Le Beau but instead of reminding me of trips to tropical beaches the heavy green and watery notes make it feel like walking into a jungle. This is that kind of fragrance that you should wear if you wish to stand out amongst other summer fragrance users</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2348442"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2348442#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2348029" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2348029" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Arochi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2314813"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2314813.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Arochi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2348029ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2348029" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); <br />
Facil de llevar pero en el dia.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2348029"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2348029#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347898" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2347898" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stonkz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1913527"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1913527.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stonkz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Vanilla-Diorama-68198.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68198.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Diorama"title="Vanilla Diorama"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2347898ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2347898" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1913527">stonkz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-13">11/13/24 13:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>nautica voyage on steroids fr</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2347898"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2347898#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347263" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2347263" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dumbplings"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1410281"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dumbplings" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2347263ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2347263" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1410281">Dumbplings</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-13">11/13/24 01:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bad reviews are just as important as good reviews, an honest review is the best type of review so here you go<br />
<br />
I tested this on paper and skin, there's not much difference actually on skin and paper for this particular fragrance. All day I kept smelling something horrible and like plastic, it was very off putting in the air and couldn't figure out why this awful smell followed be everywhere. I realized when I moved my arms around the smell was projecting from the le beau paradise garden so then it became so unbearable and cloying I scrubbed it off my skin.... Unfortunately that still didn't fix the problem, the smell was still following me around. I then realized I had the tester strip in my pocket and this was also causing the awful smell. For some reason I kept the test strip and didn't throw it out and then I left it on my table in my bedroom when I got home. And yep this was the 3rd mistake I made because my room smelled like plastic and I had to put up with this smell for like more than 3 days straight as it stank out my room too. Sure I could've just thrown the test strip in the bin but the curiosity part of me wanted to give it a fair chance and see if my nose would adjust to the smell after a few days and see if I liked it the next day after and nope quite the opposite the more I smelled it the worse it became. Now I can't stand the smell of this without wanting to actually puke/vomit it's something I hope nobody wears in public around me I even avoid walking past the JPG stand in shops too because if anyone is spraying it near me i'll probably just vomit everywhere in the store. Quite an unpleasant experience and this fragrance is way too overrated... <br />
<br />
Apart from the plastic smell yes there's a greenness to it, it's not even really a creamy or sweet scent either like some other coconut fragrances can be instead I just consider this to be like mostly green fig with a cloying plastic smell to it. Also maybe it's the salt that's causing a bad reaction like i've seen smelling salts can make people disgusted to possibly the salt in here doesn't agree with me, which is strange since I love salty aquatic fragrances usually. And contrary to the fig note, Philosykos is actually one of my favourite fragrances too this doesn't smell like philosykos at all</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2347263"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2347263#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346962" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346962" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jbozz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445544"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1445544.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jbozz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/MYSLF-Le-Parfum-94983.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94983.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="MYSLF Le Parfum"title="MYSLF Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346962ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346962" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445544">jbozz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 18:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh my gosh, this stuff is gorgeous but you absolutely must like coconut because its still the star of the show here. Its definitely on the green side with the mint which actually compliments the tropical vibe here and gives everything a nice freshness. The light saltiness gives this fragrance a mineral aspect that is just perfect. Paradise Garden is beautifully blended and anyone who says otherwise that this is disgusting or just smells bad doesnt know what theyre talking about. This is a terrific release and absolutely perfect for the summer. Its still sweet but not as heavy as the previous Le Beaus, so its much easier for regular if not daily wear in my opinion. This has a versatility that the other two dont quite have but while still retaining that playful and beachy vibe. I cannot stop smelling my skin and I do not find this nauseating at all, but again if you dont like coconut you will not like this. Anyway I am loving this very much right now and look forward to using this a lot in the warmer weather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2346962"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2346962#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2343424" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
This a brutal perfume, brutal and best performance in all aspects, both in longevity (above 12hrs) and sillage.<br />
<br />
Fresh, vibrant, caribbean scent vibe, with coconut and marine presence. So good.<br />
<br />

Womanity is amazing, but is sometimes too sexy, too intense. Impossible to find Blanc Ensoleille from Zara (which was too notch!) and I dont care for the LArtisan fig one and cannot afford BDK. So I remembered this little wonder! Luckily I found it online and ordered it right away. Very pleased. Lovely fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2340283"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2340283#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2339553" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2339553" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Saveria"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847747"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1847747.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Saveria" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chopard/Casmir-348.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.348.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Casmir"title="Casmir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2339553ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2339553" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847747">Saveria</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-06">11/06/24 02:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An opening made of tonka, quickly overtaken by coconut then by marine notes and, finally, by a hint of mint which finishes it all off.<br />
<br />
Le Beau Paradise Garden is a very fresh exotic/marine fragrance. It has a strong similarity to Le Beau but much more refreshing, I find it pretty nice.<br />
<br />
It will appeal to lovers of marine/summer perfumes.<br />
<br />
The bottle is magnificent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2339553"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2339553#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2339111" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its definitely very green.<br />
I mainly get coconut and some green notes with some noticeable fig. The sandalwood makes this fragance more creamy on top of the coconut <br />
Will update</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2339111"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2339111#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338496" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; For me it takes over and drowns everything else out. I had one of the other ones and ended up giving it away. I think this one will share a similar fate. It's not bad or unpleasant. I get minty coconut with this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2338264"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2338264#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2333287" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2333287" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ThiccandJuicyLime"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1675237"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1675237.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ThiccandJuicyLime" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2333287ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2333287" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1675237">ThiccandJuicyLime</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-31">10/31/24 03:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Women's POV: I find this scent extremely sexy. The fig gives a nice creamy vibe and it reminds me a lot of kenzo pour homme but much more sweet and modern. I think its extremely alluring and I smell this stuff everywhere (kinda popular here rn) but good for me Ig ;)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2333287"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2333287#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2329935" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2329935" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ronald J"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1229215"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ronald J" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Intense-Oud-32743.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32743.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Intense Oud"title="Intense Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2329935ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2329935" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1229215">Ronald J</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-28">10/28/24 03:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Delicious fresh green fragrance, but I disagree with the "Nuclear performance" &amp; "Insane projection".<br />
The blast of freshness from the opening is short-lived and is a nice sweet Fig &amp; Tonka scent on my clothes for the next 2 hours. <br />
I don't mind this for a summer fragrance. Not everything has to be an extrait de parfum quality of performance.<br />
This is inoffensive, mild, fresh and very different from the coconut heavy Le Beau originals.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2329935"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2329935#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2329918" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2329918" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hugo Montez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/985319"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.985319.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hugo Montez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2329918ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2329918" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/985319">Hugo Montez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-28">10/28/24 03:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hype? why? this is just another variation of a suntain lotion super sweet scent. It's very longlasting and projects pretty good, though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2329918"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2329918#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2328270" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2328270" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="evan13gray"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2100569"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="evan13gray" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2328270ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2328270" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2100569">evan13gray</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-26">10/26/24 09:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>5.9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2328270"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2328270#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327935" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2327935" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheDogfatherHTX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1824841.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheDogfatherHTX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Happiness-69224.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69224.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud for Happiness"title="Oud for Happiness"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2327935ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2327935" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841">TheDogfatherHTX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-26">10/26/24 00:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Jean Paul Gaultier's Le Beau Paradise Garden was released this year and took the fragcom by storm in a serious way. Everybody was talking about it and couldn't give it enough praise. Some said it was the best fragrance JPG has released thus far, with some even going as far as labeling it the best fragrance release of the year. I admittedly do enjoy most of what JPG has to offer with their Le Male/Le Beau line, so I'm excited to see what this one brings to the table. Let's get into it;<br />
<br />
Scent:<br />
The opening is fruity, green, and aquatic. The primary notes I get are coconut, green notes, watery notes, and fig. The strongest of the notes are the green notes and the coconut. The "green notes" note, being non-descript, is hard to accurately identify. To me it smells like fresh grass and green leaves. The coconut is very tropical and creamy with an inherent milky sweetness. I am fairly sure it is the same coconut note used in Le Beau Le Parfum. This is followed by the watery notes and fig. The watery notes are very noticeable, and while they don't really have their own separate accord in the opening they work by bestowing a "misted" or "rained on" nuance to all the other notes. For instance, the green notes take on the semblance of grass or green leaves after a rain. Not in a petrichor sense, just a watery sense. Lastly, the fig rounds out the opening with an extra dose of fruity sweetness with a touch of green. I do get icy/cooling hints of the mint in between the other notes as well. The dry down is fruity, sweet, and woody. The primary notes I get are coconut, watery notes, tonka bean, and sandalwood. The strongest of the notes are the coconut and tonka bean. The coconut has the same accord from the opening, but the tonka bean has opened up to provide extra sweetness with the signature powderiness that tonka carries. This is followed by the watery notes and sandalwood. The watery notes still impart that water accord to the rest of the notes, while the sandalwood creates a foundation of woodiness and adds some creaminess that boosts the tonka and coconut notes. The green notes are still there as well, but they play second fiddle to the rest of the notes. Overall a beautiful scent profile from opening to dry down.<br />
<br />
Performance:<br />
Initial projection is nuclear and fills the room. Sillage matches that strength with a dense scent trail. After a few hours the projection was still filling a room and the scent trail was still easily noticeable. At the 7-8 hour mark the projection was about arms length and the scent trail was still noticeable. Around 11-12 hours later the projection was still hanging on at around arms length, and the scent trail had faded but was still slightly noticeable. The fragrance didn't become a skin scent until after the 12th hour, making it certified eternal.<br />
<br />
When to wear:<br />
This is a spring/summer fragrance most suited for daytime wear. This would be a good pick for going out or going on a date, but I wouldn't pick this to wear to the office or formal occasions as it's a bit too tropical and casual.<br />
<br />
Blind buy:<br />
If you like the Le Beau line from JPG, or you like sweet and tropical scents in general, this would be a safe blind buy for you.<br />
<br />
Final verdict:<br />
There's a reason this fragrance has been difficult to find; the hype around it is well deserved. It's by far the best entry in the Le Beau line, both in scent profile and performance. Whereas Le Beau and Le Beau Le Parfum can sometimes be a bit to sweet for people in the warmer months, Paradise Garden slots in perfectly. Not only that, but it outlasts and projects harder than both of them as well. Don't get me wrong, I really enjoy Le Beau Le Parfum. But as much as I enjoy it, Paradise Garden is just on another level. Historically, Le Male Le Parfum has been my favorite JPG. Now having worn this, I can say Paradise Garden easily ties for first (they just have different wearability). Lastly, when it comes to compliment factor this fragrance is a home run. I remember spraying it on at the store right after I bought it, and I hadn't been wearing it 5 minutes before someone asked me what I had on. Suffice to say this is a gem of a fragrance. I would recommend every man pick this up for their warm weather rotation. Trust me, you'll thank me later when the compliments are rolling in.<br />
<br />
Scent: 10/10<br />
Longevity: 9/10<br />
Sillage: 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2327935"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2327935#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2325201" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2325201" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fenissa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1633872"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1633872.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fenissa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Francesca-Bianchi/Encounters-85936.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85936.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Encounters"title="Encounters"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2325201ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2325201" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); I literally just tested it in store today, but I'm in the UK.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2325201"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2325201#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2324576" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2324576" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sidiouss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2251822"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sidiouss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Eros-Flame-52180.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52180.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eros Flame"title="Eros Flame"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2324576ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2324576" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2251822">Sidiouss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-23">10/23/24 00:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Guys, is this discontinued?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2324576"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2324576#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2323006" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2323006" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="skyon33"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1987838"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1987838.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="skyon33" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2323006ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2323006" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1987838">skyon33</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-21">10/21/24 13:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This stuff just stinks</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Only one that doesn't suffocate me and doesn't smell synthetic. Fresh and sweet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2320196"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2320196#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2315098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2315098" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="4scentsin1day"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1039029"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1039029.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="4scentsin1day" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2315098ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2315098" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1039029">4scentsin1day</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-14">10/14/24 00:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Take me down to the Paradise Garden<br />
Where the grass is green and the girls are pretty<br />
Take me home (I want you, please, take me home)<br />
<br />
Ahh Paradise Garden, AKA The Coco Nuke because of its nuclear performance and strong Coconut accord.<br />
<br />
Man, I honestly dont see the hype behind the JPG line these days, all the TikTok boys thinking the modern Le Male flankers are the secret juices from the fountain of youth.<br />
<br />
But fuck! This is good, Paradise Garden is actually good. This stuff is growing on me, the potency I find very satiating as I do like strong fragrances. I have sprayed x3 times and received a compliment 12.5 hours later, I say this rivals scents such as Red Tobacco, Original (2008) batches of One Million, you know the beast modes.<br />
<br />
Ill admit now that Im keen to try a few of the other Le Male flankers</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2315098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2315098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314909" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Too overhyped. Nothing greater than a Cool Water intense or Eternity Aromatic Essence. The meatriders will love and glaze everything released by the Gaultier. This is yet another sweet, synthetic mess called as ''freshie''. If you insist on coconut, a Cool Water intense will satisfy you and save your bucks, if you insist on Le Beau; just go with the parfum version.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
