Still a compliment bomb and a great safe blind buy. 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2308095"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2308095#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2305746" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2305746" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="palabokz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492921"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1492921.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="palabokz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2305746ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2305746" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492921">palabokz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-05">10/05/24 09:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Le Beau Paradise Garden is THE fragrance for a tropical country. Its a literal coconut bomb that is very inoffensive and almost gourmand in how it smells like a freshly opened coconut. In my opinion the scent is pretty linear, with the coconut being the main show for the entire lifespan of the fragrance. The green notes and slight hint of aquatics are also there to add further depth. Performance is superb for a relatively fresh fragrance. People still comment on how I smell 5 hours from application. The smell lingers on my skin for the next 10 hours.<br />
<br />
Scent: 10/10<br />
Longevity: 8/10<br />
Projection and Sillage: 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2305746"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2305746#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2305687" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2302385" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WhatsASmell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2230634"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2230634.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="WhatsASmell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Beau Paradise Garden"title="Le Beau Paradise Garden"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2302385ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2302385" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2230634">WhatsASmell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-02">10/02/24 09:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Finally got a bottle and its pretty good! <br />
Top 10/10<br />
Mid 8/10 <br />
Base 6/10 <br />
Longevity 8/10<br />
I think it can be pulled off all year but it gets a little cloying towards the base. Dont recommend paying full price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2302385"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2302385#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301359" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301359" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MansEderstrom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1979508"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1979508.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MansEderstrom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Erba-Pura-55157.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55157.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Erba Pura"title="Erba Pura"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2301359ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2301359" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1979508">MansEderstrom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-01">10/01/24 10:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is meh. i would say the opening is a very strong coconut smell which is the thing I don't like about it. But then the base notes are very nice. My friend has this fragrance, which smells good on him. I think about my friend when I smell this. Very nice for the summer and winter. I'm not too fond of the coconut smell tho.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2301359"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2301359#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301349" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301349" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="miu frags"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2250097"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2250097.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="miu frags" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2301349ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2301349" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2250097">miu frags</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-01">10/01/24 10:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When i say this stuff last i mean this stuff LASTS. I sprayed 2 or 3 sprays on my hoodie and left it in my car, 6 days later when i remembered where i left it the smell was still there and strong. The opening is a little harsh but the dry down is a milky coconut mixed with mint and a very small touch of fig. Its a perfect tropical smell and i LOVE it. 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2301349"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2301349#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301199" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The opening is just so special and this thing projects like a beast and lasts pretty long. I've had people tell me 90% of the time its their favorite out of my 18 fragrances I own. I can see how people would say it smells too synthetic... to me its the perfect balance, and it smells perfect. Even if you're not buying this, sample it! It's just so good. To me it smells too synthetic and cheap, and overall I don't find it particularly pleasant. The performance is out of  control. This has to be the most nuclear and persistent fragrance I have ever dealt with. One spray and everyone in the city will know you have arrived, so be careful. Ultra unsafe blind buy. Test first, I'm telling you. Tropical fragrances are the new thing, apparently, so there are options. Test and shop around.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2299703"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2299703#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2297725" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2294821" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="btd069"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341525"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1341525.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="btd069" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/French-Riviera-74636.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74636.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="French Riviera"title="French Riviera"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2294821ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2294821" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341525">btd069</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-25">09/25/24 11:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresher and very Sandalwood heavy on my skin.  Similar to the other flankers otherwise. Very nice fragrance, but IMO not worth retail.  I'd wait for discounters.  I paid $110 no tax for a 4.2oz bottle and felt like i overpaid even though this is not a bad price for designers these days ($137 Retail).  I'd personally pull the trigger at $80ish if it gets that low.  <br />
<br />
Green, Coconutty, Figs, Zinginess from the Ginger, and very prominent Woods opening.  I like the drydown way more than the opening.  I don't get a strong Tonka-like root beer quality at all.  If i imagine really hard, I get a beachy salty skin smell but could not recognize it on my own.  Though i like the scent more in the drydown, I feel like it weakens a lot as it starts to dry down as well as getting slightly sweeter on my skin. <br />
<br />
Overall a pretty solid release.  I like it better than the other two flankers.  I make all these observations to give others a better picutre and not because i don't like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2294821"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2294821#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2293644" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2293644" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BouklasDO"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2162873"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2162873.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BouklasDO" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2293644ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2293644" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2162873">BouklasDO</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-24">09/24/24 09:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Overall, it's good, maybe better than the other le beau. I would describe the opening as removing the incense from adg profondo and adding phylosycos to it. Green, watery, coconutty. As it dries down, it's a little hard to describe, kind of spicy, juicy; then back to green, kinda sweet. Overall, pleasant and definitely unique. Lasts around 4 to 5 hours, which is meh but what can you do. Definitely don't blind buy though, it's extremely hyped relative to how subjective it smells from person to person. Also, it's important to say that the fig note, which is one of my favorites, lasts very very little.<br />
<br />
Edit: yesterday a girl tracked me in a room full of people to tell me that I smell great.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2293644"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2293644#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2290466" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2290466" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="elsekymeky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/95952"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.95952.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="elsekymeky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2290466ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2290466" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/95952">elsekymeky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-21">09/21/24 10:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>-Starts With a Fresh Greeny smell.<br />
<br />
-You'll detect Mint, Ginger, and Coconut with a hint of sweetness from Fig.<br />
<br />
-After minutes of calm,  the woody smell starts to appear, like the Kinzo line.<br />
<br />
-It's something new from JPG and great for autumn and summer.<br />
<br />
-Good for all occasions. <br />
<br />
-Age is over 30s.<br />
<br />
-Moderate performance overall.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2290466"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2290466#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2288093" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Ive tried the normal Le beau and thats grown on me but I found it too synthetic for my taste, this is a greener, fresher entry to the Le beau line and Im all for it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Extremely sweet, masculine, long lasting. Sweet coconut with a nice touch of ginger and mint in the opening. Then it drys down to a super sweet coconut. Mass appealing, gets you compliments and is not as thick and heavy as le beau le parfum, more versatile and easier to wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2280438"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2280438#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2279593" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2279593" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cody_RS"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2240227"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cody_RS" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2279593ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2279593" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2279593"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2279593#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2278569" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2278569" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="charlieleejr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1793123"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1793123.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="charlieleejr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2278569ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2278569" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1793123">charlieleejr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-10">09/10/24 18:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What the actual ****!! There aren't many fragrances that last 24 hours and when you find one, it's usually pungent woody nose burning feces. This though, it's tropical, sweet, and aquatic. I just received my bottle yesterday and when I got out the shower, I sprayed two sprays on each wrist. It was actually too much. This is too sweet to overspray. I wore it to bed and woke up still smelling sweet and coconutty. I sprayed ADG Absolu on top because I didn't want to go to work smelling tropical. About the time I was heading home, I smelled my wrists because I thought I caught a whiff of coconut... and I was right!! The ADG wore off and the Paradise Garden began to shine again. INSANE<br />
<br />
I do like the scent. It's well worth the money. It's more of a spring/summer daytime fragrance than anything. I don't think this is very versatile but who knows... i might still like it in a few months. Our summers down here are hot and last at least 6 months so I will surely get my money's worth out of this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2278569"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2278569#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2277974" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But then as it dries down you get what they advertise to you but just a bit different.  A medium amount of vanilla, small amount of coconut and a big dose of this green scent that i just cant describe.<br />
<br />
Perfomance is alright lasted around 6 hours on my skin, and about 2 inches away from my arm i could start to smell it.<br />
<br />
smell: 7/10<br />
perfomance: 6.5/10<br />
overall: 8/10<br />
<br />
(I dont really like the opening, i already hate burberry touch)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2277360"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2277360#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275965" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Excellent longevity and great projection. As per my opinion,it is more of unisex because I am not getting ginger at all. Linear smell but really loud with great trail. Compliment booster. I recommend not to blind buy as sweet coconut remains persistent and I don't think everyone would love it. However, it is great blind buy for me fortunately.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2275965"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2275965#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2274730" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Whether it be flim, fragrance, cuisine, music, etc... <br />
<br />
<br />
With that being said, this is Kenzo Intense to almost an exact replica, but 3 times the price. Save yourself the money and get Kenzo Intense instead.<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
Side note:<br />
<br />
Good lord perfumers... can any of you do anything original anymore?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2274730"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2274730#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2273416" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I get a lot of Coconut, Fig, and Tonka Bean in this.<br />
Later in the drydown the Sandalwood starts peaking through and then becomes the dominant note. <br />
I do wish the Mint and Watery Notes were a lot stronger in this. <br />
I like this a lot more than the other Le Beau fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2272949"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2272949#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2272468" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2272468" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vary"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1835404"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1835404.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vary" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2272468ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2272468" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); Maybe you got a fake or something is wrong with it because why would any company release something that smells bad. <br />
<br />
Its nice, best out of the le beau line for me because I like the green and salty aspect. Its nothing too special but its a nice scent 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2272468"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2272468#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271049" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
I wouldn't like to smell it on anybody. Theoretically I like all of the notes in this but together they are toxic - maybe this is due to mixing the fresh and warm tones. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265880" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Masonb2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2157424"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2157424.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Masonb2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265880ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265880" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2157424">Masonb2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-30">08/30/24 09:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample of this and its not what I expected its not a masculine smell at all its not feminine it literally smells like coconut milk and grass people only own this because of the tictok hype I even wanted it for a while and changed my mind but for this cologne you can be a guy a girl black or white gay or straight NOBODY can pull this off in my opinion I would never expect to smell someone were paradise garden its so off putting and is le beau edt on crack the performance is beast mode I heard the new batches only last 6 hours wich is some body spray if anyone knows how to pull of a smell like this let me know because if you can rock this smell you cant and I dont let your self think you can no girl wants her bf smelling like he rolled around it cut grass if you wanna smell like my dog go for it this is the thing for you but the ones who wanna pull and actually smell good stick to the le male line they got those ones right this is a mess jpg were were you going with this?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2265880"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2265880#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265236" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265236" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ellisosb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1058725"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ellisosb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rogue-Perfumery/Fougere-L-Aube-53815.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53815.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fougere LAube"title="Fougere LAube"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265236ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265236" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1058725">ellisosb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 17:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Creamy, sugary coconut and green fig in the open. A few seconds later you get some interesting herbaceous notes around the outside with the creamy opening at the center. It *quickly* changes about 3 more times in the next few minutes. Salty, then vanillic, then even a touch floral. When you smell it up close, it feels kind of like the elements are fighting for their place in the blend, but not in an unpleasant way. In the air, it's a much lighter, more interesting wear. <br />
<br />
I've caught moments of it being bracingly fresh, and others with a slightly watery honeydew melon-type vibe. The sandalwood is NOT overly woodsy. Rather, it joins the creamy opening pretty seamlessly. It's not the same scent, but to my nose, this sandalwood is used similarly to Tam Dao EDP from Diptyque. I *definitely* don't see the comparison to Santal 33 (one of my favorite scents). To me, this smells like a slightly fresher Tam Dao meets Debaser by DS &amp; Durga. It even has a little bit of Edgewater from Michael Malul x Gents Scents in it, which would make sense consindering how much Ash likes this one. It's a cool scent that could earn a spot as a change of pace in a summer rotation.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2265236"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2265236#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264936" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2264936" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="londonnight"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1662548"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="londonnight" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2264936ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2264936" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1662548">londonnight</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 11:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>le labo 33 very similar .very nice feagrance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2264936"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2264936#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264257" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2264257" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="camp1nhoM"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2162239"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2162239.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="camp1nhoM" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2264257ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2264257" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2162239">camp1nhoM</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-28">08/28/24 19:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of the best fragrances I've smelled on the last years. It is super versatile, you just adjust the sprays up or down and you're good. This smells good from up close, in the air, in the opening to the dry down, which is really uncommon. It is a massive compliment-getter as it is not too pretentious or complex, it has really good performance but not at the cost of being heavy on the nose like other fragrances do, it feels light when it hit your nose, but it still manages to be a pretty long lasting scent with good projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2264257"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2264257#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2262947" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2262947" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NauticaVoyageFan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2114601"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2114601.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NauticaVoyageFan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Overture-Man-55859.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55859.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Overture Man"title="Overture Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2262947ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2262947" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2114601">NauticaVoyageFan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-27">08/27/24 15:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Le Beau Paradise Gardens By Jean Paul Gaultier was a massive surprise considering I had no expectations of this fragrance considering the other JPG fragrances from the Le Male or Le Beau line however I never got the chance to try this fragrance. Now I wouldn't say I like fragrances that are overhyped on social media but when I blind bought this I was extremely surprised. The smell is exactly what is on the tin, a classic summer fragrance that isn't amazing but it's not horrible with good notes of coconut, green, and oceanic notes taking over the scent making it a great fragrance for casual situations. Overall the scent is a basic but safe scent considering this is from JPG yet the price tag is a considerably different situation since this is sold out practically everywhere it feels like every store that somehow sells this will sell this at different prices, now I have this fragrance for around $150 for the 75ml version so idk if I have been scammed or not but I do believe this is slightly overpriced with better brands for less.<br />
<br />
Now the performance of this was the biggest shock of this fragrance. Other JPG scents have very poor longevity like Ultramale and Elixir which barely lasts but this scent lasts for around 8 hours which to me is crazy for a JPG and as an overall summer fragrance. The sillage is now what is disappointing as I can barely smell this from a conversational distance and I can only smell this at close distance.<br />
 <br />
Scent: 8/10<br />
Performance: 5/10<br />
Longevity: 7/10<br />
Sillage: 2/10<br />
Price: 5/10<br />
Blind Buy Safe: 9/10<br />
Overall: 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2262947"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2262947#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2261489" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258526" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wan66"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2168611"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2168611.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wan66" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Pacific-Chill-81423.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81423.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pacific Chill"title="Pacific Chill"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258526ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258526" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2168611">Wan66</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 10:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Shocks me in a bad way I cant see the hype at all. Smells like pure wet grass on a hot day. Its weird and I wouldnt pay the premium you have to with this one at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2258526"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2258526#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258193" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258193" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ibrahim88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254299"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ibrahim88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Hindu-Kush-49030.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49030.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hindu Kush"title="Hindu Kush"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258193ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258193" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254299">Ibrahim88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 05:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Relieve sweetness with the addition of mint and green notes made it more beautiful and wearable than adp..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2258193"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2258193#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256021" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2256021" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="richthenfamous"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1076303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1076303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="richthenfamous" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2256021ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2256021" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1076303">richthenfamous</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 04:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Already one of my most complimented in my collection... It's a coconut scented sun lotion type of smell with a aquatic/salty twist making this the perfect fresh and sweet fragrance. The fig too provides a green, juicy and sweet backbone to the formula making it highly mass appealing from the top to bottom.<br />
<br />
Paradise garden is pretty strong, especially in the opening hours do not overspray!! (I got told it was way too strong once) After the bottle has been sitting for a couple months the longevity also goes well beyond 12+ hrs on my skin and on clothes it sticks for many days if not weeks... It's mainly a spring/summer fragrance but can be worn in fall too.<br />
<br />
To me this is the best one in the line with clear purpose of what is trying to do, Paradise garden is fresh and sweet done right.<br />
Highly Recommend 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2256021"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2256021#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254481" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254481" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragance_Snow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2221719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2221719.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragance_Snow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254481ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254481" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2221719">Fragance_Snow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-19">08/19/24 15:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honest review: <br />
<br />
I bought samples of Jean Paul Gaultier Le Beau, Le Beau Le Parfum and Paradise Garden. Im having a hard time choosing. All 3 are amazing and share the same DNA. Keep in mind that if you DONT like coconut, tonka or sweet fragrances this is NOT for you!!!!!<br />
<br />
Le Beau EDT (8/10)  has a fresh citric opening and remains a sweet/creamy fragrance with coconut and tonka as its base notes. Its super fresh and i would classify it as a summer everyday fragrance. This one doesnt last as long as the other 2. <br />
<br />
Le beau Le Parfum (8.5/10)has a rich strong opening (they removed the critic component) that has pineapple, iris &amp; woody notes. I cant smell the ginger but its cited as one of the opening notes. Le Parfum is the longer lasting among the 3. The smell transitions into a rich ambery one containing sandalwood. Could be overpowering in summer days. Its better for spring, summer nights and fall. <br />
<br />
Lastly, Paradise Garden (9/10) (instead of citrus or pineapple) has a green opening where you can smell the mint and fig. Its shares features of the 2 previous ones as it keeps the coconut/tonka dna and also uses sandalwood as its base note. Its also very fresh and could be used for spring and summer. <br />
<br />
I will buy most likely buy a full bottle of JPG-Paradise Garden as i live in a very hot and tropical climate. Otherwise, i would go for Le Parfum. If you live in a more template climate go for Le Parfum, specially if youre an adult and want a more mature and rich fragrance. If youre in school go full fresh with Le Beau EDT or Paradise Garden.  <br />
<br />
As a personal preference, I wouldnt recommend buying all 3 bc they are similar. I would rather diversify your collection trying other fragrances. <br />
<br />
Remember that fragrance preferences are subjective and may perform differently on each person skin, give them a try ;)<br />
<br />
Regards,<br />
Snow</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2254481"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2254481#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2253815" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2253815" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="michael.oliver"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/965889"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.965889.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="michael.oliver" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/Rien-Intense-Incense-24713.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.24713.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rien Intense Incense"title="Rien Intense Incense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2253815ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2253815" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/965889">michael.oliver</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-19">08/19/24 01:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Having wanted to sample this for some time, and being an OG lover from the 90s, I had been a little... underwhelmed of late with JPG's releases, other than the Parfum a few years ago.<br />
<br />
I totally get the hype on this. It is a PURE summer fragrance, and works really well in the higher heat. I sampled this yesterday whilst out with my wife and she was floored by it. So much so I had to buy a bottle (for both of us to wear). The projection isn't beastly but the longevity is. My wife was still goo goo this morning after still smelling this on my beard from the initial test spray (3 squirts) yesterday, which is very surprising after it being a freshy. <br />
<br />
I think I still have a good month of wearing this in the UK until Autumn gets a good grip on the climate. Enjoy it while you can.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2253815"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2253815#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2253702" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2253702" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pyetro a. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2252450" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nicolasnmc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1197863"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="nicolasnmc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Un-Jardin-Sur-Le-Nil-18.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Un Jardin Sur Le Nil"title="Un Jardin Sur Le Nil"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2252450ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2252450" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1197863">nicolasnmc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-17">08/17/24 12:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive never tried a Le Beau fragrance before, but I am familiar with Le Male and Ultra Male from JPG. To me, this is a slightly less sweet ultra male with some Le Male DNA and some coconut and mint thrown in. Definitely a nice smelling fragrance. Do not buy it for the ridiculous prices of $160+ though or youll be severely disappointed. Its definitely very designer and smells synthetic. It reminds me a little of a fragrance I used to wear, eau de grey flannel, with its synthetic mint note smelling kind of like eucalyptus but this scent is much sweeter and more coconut forward. Overall, I like this fragrance and think it would definitely pull a lot of compliments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2252450"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2252450#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2250799" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2250799" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hamza_Chaudry03"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1592539"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1592539.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hamza_Chaudry03" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/BDK-Parfums/Gris-Charnel-57038.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57038.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gris Charnel"title="Gris Charnel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2250799ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2250799" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1592539">Hamza_Chaudry03</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-15">08/15/24 21:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>No need for an acquired taste for this fragrance. Ideal for a gift as it is overall pleasant and inoffensive. Crisp and clean, with a little sweet touch!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2250799"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2250799#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2249262" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2249262" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jeranium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2221825"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2221825.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jeranium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2249262ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2249262" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2221825">Jeranium</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-14">08/14/24 13:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It still has that party boy clubbing Le Male DNA.  The coconut and mint both are noticeable yet well-blended.  Its comparatively weak for a JPG frag, though.  I am picking up whiffs of the hot buttery popcorn smell that Rabanne 1 Million has.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2249262"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2249262#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248988" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It does not last long on my skin at all, 2-3 hours tops. Opening and mid notes smell nice, but do not expect the middle notes to last long. The base is so weak and artificial it could be a Kardasian!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2246471"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2246471#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2245706" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
