padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169512">Reubns</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-11">08/11/24 05:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this fragrance smells so damn good. it has such an awesome green and watery opening that dries down into a nice green, floral coconutty scent. it not only smells good but also performs beast mode imo. i apply 7 sprays and it lasts me the entire day and some. i also gave a tester to a mate and i could smell 1 spray on his wrist 30 minutes later from 5 metres away. 100% worth retail, however i would wait for it to come out in discounters to get a bargain.<br />
<br />
scent 9.5/10<br />
performance 9.3/10<br />
bottle 8.5/10 (love the flower)<br />
atomiser 9/10<br />
<br />
gonna be my signature this summer 100%.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2245706"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2245706#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2244485" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2244485" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lesramen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2202602"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2202602.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lesramen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2244485ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2244485" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2202602">lesramen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-09">08/09/24 22:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As soon as I got my hands on a sample I immediately fell in love with it. I understand the green notes can be overwhelming to some but after the dry down a sweet, refreshing coconut scent reminiscent of my local restaurants coconut cake takes over. The coconut is strong but not overwhelmingly sweet, so the scent itself still remains crisp and watery. Highly recommend for the summer, but I feel like it could serve me well in the winter if used during the day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2244485"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2244485#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2244423" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2243225" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2086004"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2243225ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2243225" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2086004">Bag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-08">08/08/24 18:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Genuinely my favorite designer release this year. Takes Le Beau EDT, and adds ginger and mint, while expanding on it's longevity, of which is lasting me about 6-8 hours on clothes and skin. Beautifully crafted, a shame it took so long to become more available in the states. Glad I could get a 4.2oz during that last restock.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2243225"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2243225#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2243215" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2243215" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dk2852"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2163387"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dk2852" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2243215ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2243215" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2163387">dk2852</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-08">08/08/24 18:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This might be my favorite fragrance in my entire collection. It's like the original Le Beau but so much more complex, to the point that the original is not worth buying. Top notes of coconut, mint, ginger. I can definitely smell the fig and green notes as well, and it does have the base tonka of the original DNA. This works great in high heat too, and I can wear it in the middle of summer with no problem. Such a great fragrance, definitely worth trying if you like JPG and sweet fresh fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2243215"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2243215#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2242248" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2242248" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ShimeX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2215293"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ShimeX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Uomo-Born-In-Roma-Intense-78740.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78740.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Intense"title="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2242248ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2242248" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2215293">ShimeX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-07">08/07/24 19:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Jean Paul Gaultier Le Beau Paradise Garden opens with this coconut-sweet, sexy smell, but at the same time, thanks to the green notes and fig, you get that nice touch of freshness. The sweetness and freshness combined together create a harmony for my nose that I just cannot stop adoring. As it dries even more, you pick up more of that sandalwood that's in there, and the tonka bean vanilla flavour starts to also kick in later on. On my skin, it lasts 8+ hours, which for a summer/spring-type fragrance is fantastic. I have fallen in love with this fragrance from the first instance I smelled it. <br />
Overall, I would rate this fragrance a solid 9/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2242248"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2242248#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241486" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2241486" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Frankishtain"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1866437"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1866437.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Frankishtain" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Code-Parfum-75126.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75126.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Code Parfum"title="Armani Code Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2241486ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2241486" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1866437">Frankishtain</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-07">08/07/24 03:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Summer vibes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2241486"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2241486#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241358" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2241358" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zorosus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2103885"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2103885.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="zorosus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Beau Paradise Garden"title="Le Beau Paradise Garden"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2241358ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2241358" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2103885">zorosus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-06">08/06/24 23:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Boy oh boy where do I even begin... Paradise Garden.. honey, my pookie bear. I have loved you ever since I first laid my nose on you. Jokes aside, I absolutely love this fragrance. From the first time i smelled it on my friend, I KNEW I had to buy it. Everytime he was wearing it, i would smell the fragrance before we would even dap each other up. The smell is just gorgeous, one that stands out, and the projection helps at that too. Now i must say, the longevity is THE ONLY part where it is mid, i get around 6-7 hours, but considering it is a fresh fragrance, i'm not even surprised. And i don't even care that much, the gorgeous green minty notes combined with coconut, fig and tonka make it one of the best scents i've personally smelled, and again, projection is also insane. I really don't get why people hate on it so much, I guess it's become a trend for people to hate on something just because it's popular and hyped up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2241358"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2241358#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241284" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I also actually get great projection and longevity with this for a fresh fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2241284"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2241284#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241129" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2241129" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="roxd.david"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2170587"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2170587.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="roxd.david" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2241129ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2241129" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); The coconut plus green note is so annoyed me, I tried to like it but I couldn't bring myself to. Maybe I don't like coconut in the fragrance I guess.<br />
<br />
Logevity: 8/10<br />
Projection: 7.5/10<br />
Smell: 6/10<br />
<br />
not my style.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2241129"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2241129#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241112" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2241112" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dthereal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1953904"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dthereal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2241112ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2241112" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1953904">Dthereal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-06">08/06/24 17:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not what I was expecting due to the hype! Its A good scent dont get me wrong but its very close to le beau le parfum which I already own. Lasted around 7 hours. Its redundant to have both so will be trading or selling off</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2241112"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2241112#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239643" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2239643" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sorvaahr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1642625"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1642625.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sorvaahr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jovoy-Paris/L-Art-de-la-Guerre-25957.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25957.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Art de la Guerre"title="L'Art de la Guerre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2239643ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2239643" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1642625">sorvaahr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 10:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Alright, so I finally got my grubby paws on this one after quite a bit of searching. I have to admit, the hype kind of set the bar a bit high. I'm not fully disappointed since I did not own the Le Beau EDT and I do feel Paradise Garden is an improvement over the EDT. The fig note here freshens up the EDT and avoids the "suncream" effet I really hate from most coconut fragrances. It really surprises me since fig is usually a note I'm challenged with. Quentin's work at its prime, it seems. <br />
<br />
I can understand some who would be underwhelmed, though. If you own the Le Beau EDT this is absolutely unnecessary besides the cool tin. I daresay however that I think I prefer Paradise Garden over the Le Beau Le Parfum. I find the pineapple note screechy and sweaty on my skin. All in all, I don't think I wasted my money on Paradise Garden but the hype did set the bar a little (too) high. This is still going to be a great summer fragrance for the rest of the year and for summer 2025. The longevity is decent and about the same as my Le Beau EDT sample, so about half of Le Parfum. I still think the best summer JPG is Le Male In the Navy so far. If you prefer aquatics, go for that. If you prefer greener vibes and coconut, go for Le Beau Paradise Garden or Le Parfum. Or CK Eternity Aromatic Essence, that was a huge surprise earlier this year (similar DNA but woodier, dryer and less sweet than both Le Beau EDT and Paradise Garden).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2239643"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2239643#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239058" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2239058" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cali_Waves"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1998263"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1998263.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cali_Waves" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2239058ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2239058" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1998263">Cali_Waves</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-04">08/04/24 19:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I know JPG fragrances get a lot of hype, but this one did not live up to it! My reasons for this were the pickled cucumber note I was getting and the weak projection. I do however think that the Le Beau Le Parfum Intense is a great fragrance, where I don't have any of those issues. To each their own. Quentin's Kenzo Homme Marine has a similar scent profile to this and I prefer that one way more.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2239058"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2239058#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2238732" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2238732" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mattynice74"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057464"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mattynice74" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Absolu-Aventus-84112.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84112.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Absolu Aventus"title="Absolu Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2238732ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2238732" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057464">Mattynice74</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-04">08/04/24 11:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not worth the hype. The Le Beau EDT and Le Parfum are much better performance wise, both on longevity and projection.<br />
<br />
This one,.. I've worn it a bunch of times, and i did get a hint of pickle from that fig note sometimes in the open.  <br />
<br />
Aside from the opening it's not terribly different from the OG Le Beau and Le Parfum except this is a slight bit less sweet. Oh, and it lacks in comparison to the performance.<br />
<br />
If you don't have the others, this isn't a bad buy. If you want to dial back the sweetness a bit. If you do have the others, then this one is kind of redundant to own, unless you want the weaker little brother. <br />
<br />
6.5/10 Performance is mid, scent is redundant. And the opening is a crap shoot.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2238732"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2238732#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2238446" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2238334" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kish2994"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2183108"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kish2994" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2238334ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2238334" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2183108">Kish2994</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-04">08/04/24 01:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Paradise Garden isnt what I expected. This is green fig and tonka in a bottle. A bit fresh with sweet undertone, very tropical to say the least. If youre looking for a fresh summer day scent, this aint it. This is better for transition seasons <br />
This is loud in the beginning, becoming skin scent in 2-3hrs. This is also for younger crowds and casual.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2238334"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2238334#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2237913" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Normally i dont have any problem with sweet fragrances, in fact i love sweet fragrances. But LE BEAU LE PARFUM was irritatingly sweet and there is some note i dont like in it. On the other hand LE BEAU PARADISE GARDEN has more balanced sweetness and it feels more creamy and fresh at the same time. Im considering to get it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2237913"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2237913#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2236535" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2236535"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2236535#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2235888" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235888" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="corzecom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1532775"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="corzecom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Blanc-34893.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34893.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Soleil Blanc"title="Soleil Blanc"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235888ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235888" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1532775">corzecom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-01">08/01/24 12:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Imagine if you were a wilderness explorer stuck in an exotic jungle for hours on end, thirsty and dehydrated, suddenly stumbling upon an open air temple where every facility is dedicated to worshiping a gorgeous man who is laying on an array of ornate pillows and being fanned via giant leaves by his servants. This perfume is what the man would smell like. It opens boldly with a strong coconut note, but oddly I wouldn't call it gourmet. That note is balanced by the watery notes and ginger, which aren't recognizable, at least not on my skin, but have a note-worthy contribution. It dries into a more fig forward scent, but you can still feel the nuttiness of the coconut, and the tonic and sandalwood are much more apparent. If you want to smell manly and flamboyant and desirable, this is the scent you want.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2235888"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2235888#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2235338" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; My teenage son wears this and everytime i get blown away how delicious this is. I just wish that the womens version was this good too but unfortunately no, La Belle was disappointing to me.<br />
<br />
This is young, fresh, green, delicious coconut, sweet but fresh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2235338"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2235338#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2235317" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235317" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NavFragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2209489"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2209489.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NavFragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235317ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235317" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); I love the coconut, tonka and figs in this fragrance aswell as the green notes. I give this fragrance a 9 out of 10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2235317"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2235317#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232699" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2232699" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EpicE02"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436588"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="EpicE02" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2232699ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2232699" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436588">EpicE02</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-29">07/29/24 09:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tropical, I mainly get green notes (smidge of mint) with coconut and a bit of salt, a seaside scent. Too sweet for me and almost creamy, but an interesting scent. Not what I expected, I was expecting a fresher scent from the name/bottle design.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2232699"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2232699#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2231489" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I consistently receive compliments on it. Performance-wise, it projects strongly for the first two hours and lasts a solid 10 hours on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2231489"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2231489#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2228731" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2228731" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pepsiman523"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2074508"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2074508.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pepsiman523" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kenneth-Cole/Reaction-2966.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2966.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reaction"title="Reaction"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2228731ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2228731" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2074508">Pepsiman523</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-25">07/25/24 01:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Getting my hands on this wasn't easy but I'm glad I did. This is a fresh green coconut cologne that I think is amazing. It opens up with a burst of green notes, Vanilla, ginger, and water coconut with a hint of fig. While drying down the coconut comes out more and the fig is really prominent. When it dries down its strongly coconutty, woody, and Vanilla with a hint of fig. This is a perfect summer time coconut cologne. This is a strong fragrance, do not put too much some people are sensitive to green colognes like this. It lasts me about 8~9 hours.<br />
<br />
Smell 10/10<br />
Longevity 8.5/10<br />
Projection 7/10<br />
Performance 9/10<br />
Wearability 8/10<br />
<br />
Overall 8.5/10<br />
Personal rating 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2228731"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2228731#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2228504" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2227007" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mat10"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868488"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1868488.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mat10" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Beau Paradise Garden"title="Le Beau Paradise Garden"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2227007ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2227007" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1868488">Mat10</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-23">07/23/24 09:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Super fresh, light, and sweet. The scent is beautiful and mass-appealing. It is perfect for layering aswell, especially with sweet and fruity fragrances.<br />
The scent is a 9.2/10, quite unique for a summer scent.<br />
The performance is a 7/10. Not bad, but nothing crazy. Lasts about 7 hours. Projects alright in the first hours, but for a summer scent it is well above average in terms of performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2227007"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2227007#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2226919" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2226919" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MmmTasty"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2106783"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2106783.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MmmTasty" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2226919ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2226919" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2106783">MmmTasty</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-23">07/23/24 06:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Welcome to my garden friend, a garden so lush, so verdant, that every step you take feels like walking through a tropical dream. This is not just any garden; it is the epitome of paradise, where natures splendor and romance converge. The air is heavy with the intoxicating scent of blooming flowers and the distant sound of waves crashing against a pristine shore. A single spritz of Jean Paul Gaultiers Paradise Garden transports you deep into this fantasy.<br />
<br />
The opening notes of coconut immediately whisk you away to a secluded beach, where the sun-kissed coconuts fall gently from swaying palms. This sweet, creamy aroma mingles with the earthy richness of fig, evoking a sense of abundance and fertility. It's as if the garden is alive, pulsing with the promise of hidden delights.<br />
<br />
Strolling through this aromatic haven, you catch the subtle hint of salt carried by a gentle sea breeze. The saltiness is not overpowering but rather a delicate whisper, reminding you of ocean spray and the endless horizon beyond. This touch of salt adds an unexpected twist to the sweetness, much like a pinch of salt in a decadent dessert enhances its flavors.<br />
<br />
As you continue your exploration, the deeper, more sensual notes of tonka bean begin to emerge. This rich, warm scent envelops you like a lovers embrace, igniting a spark of passion and desire. It is as if the very essence of the garden is calling you to surrender to its seductive charms.<br />
<br />
And then theres the sandalwood, grounding and woody, providing a solid foundation for this aromatic adventure. Its smooth, creamy texture lingers on your skin, creating a sense of calm and stability amidst the lush opulence.<br />
<br />
But wait, theres more! Just as you think youve experienced all the garden has to offer, a burst of minty freshness surprises you. This invigorating note is like a cool breeze on a hot day, refreshing and revitalizing your senses. Its the perfect finishing touch to this fragrant symphony, leaving you feeling both energized and at peace.<br />
<br />
In this paradise garden, with the scent of Jean Paul Gaultiers creation enveloping you, making sweet love to your partner feels like the most natural thing in the world. The colognes harmonious blend of coconut, fig, salt, tonka bean, sandalwood, and mint creates an unforgettable experience, one that is both playful and deeply romantic. This is not just a cologne; it is a scented journey to bliss, a paradise that you can return to again and again with every spritz.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2226919"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2226919#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225656" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2225656" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jude-0808"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2200904"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jude-0808" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2225656ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2225656" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2200904">Jude-0808</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-21">07/21/24 20:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honest opinion, this was one of my first fragrances I ever got, and I must say it's really good. But if you can't get past that green note it smells disgusting. I've been going back and forth thinking about if I like it cause that green note is what makes people hate it so much. Even me myself who loves all le beaus think that the green note is weird sometimes. If you don't like the green note, 4/10, if you love it or don't mind it, 9/10. <br />
<br />
Theres also a mint note that I don't enjoy that much. Personally I give it an 8.75/10, it's pretty good but too controversial. A bunch of my cologne buddys say its the best of the le beaus or the worst of the le beaus. <br />
<br />
If you are reading this, just get le beau le parfum. I think it's much better and some people even have it at the top of their JPG list of all time. It's an actual 10/10.<br />
<br />
Overall it still is really nice and fresh, perfect for spring-summer-fall. When I first got it I hyped it up so much, but it's not that breathtaking. I still love it though, a must have for coconut and JPG lovers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2225656"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2225656#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225377" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2225377" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MoPerfumes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2156868"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2156868.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MoPerfumes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zoologist-Perfumes/Rabbit-91167.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91167.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rabbit"title="Rabbit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2225377ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2225377" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2156868">MoPerfumes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-21">07/21/24 12:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wrote a review a month ago and i gave this a 6/10! I didnt like the opening at first but now i love it! And it stays for 6-8 hours on my skin. <br />
<br />
Smells so GOOD! Amazing sillage and longevity for a summer scent!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2225377"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2225377#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225108" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2225108" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="flp"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1213552"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="flp" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Yves-Saint-Laurent-Y-45956.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45956.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yves Saint Laurent Y"title="Yves Saint Laurent Y"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2225108ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2225108" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1213552">flp</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-21">07/21/24 06:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's the new Sauvage but let's not ruin it this time, shall we? Stunning scent, great sillage, beast mode longevity, all seasons.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2225108"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2225108#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2224979" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2224979" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NoirMemoir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1329296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NoirMemoir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Allsaints/Incense-City-61465.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61465.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Incense City"title="Incense City"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2224979ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2224979" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329296">NoirMemoir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-21">07/21/24 01:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Even blindfolded you could tell its a Jean Paul Gaultier.<br />
<br />
Paradise Garden is all about a very sweet, juicy coconut that overpowers everything. Death-by-coconut, those who love sweet coconut in perfumery will find it appealing. I would go as far as classify it a semi-gourmand because of how dominant this note is. I say "semi-gourmand" because i find the note so exagerated and intense its not even realistic. There is an influence of tonka bean, to create a fluffy soft base. <br />
<br />
It gives off tropical vibes. Actually, a better name would have been Tropical Garden because somehow i imagine "Paradise" to smell greener and more "garden-y". Ironically, i feel like it would be too cloying for me in the summer heat, in the same way Kenzo Homme EDP is. It shares a similarity with the Kenzo, not through scent, but through the chemical compounds used. Both are created by Quentin Bisch and honestly im not a fan of his work. What i will give to him is he knows how to make beast mode synthetic fragrances. JPG Paradise Garden lasts alot on my skin, the next day i could still faintly smell the aroma on my hand after a shower. I believe it draws compliments aswell because it has the diffusiveness and longevity to do so. <br />
<br />
It could pass as unisex, especially in the first couple of hours. Definetly for a young crowd. <br />
<br />
In comparition, Le Beau Le Parfum is less focused on the coconut, more "fragrancy", more versatile and palatable to me hence why i prefer it to Paradise Garden.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2224979"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2224979#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2224622" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2224622" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EauDeJay"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234080"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1234080.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EauDeJay" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Moschino/Toy-Boy-55858.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55858.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Toy Boy"title="Toy Boy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2224622ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2224622" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234080">EauDeJay</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-20">07/20/24 15:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wasnt a fan of Le Beau EDT because eventually I found the sweet coconut note a little clawing, but this flanker is perfect! Eases up on the sweetness and adds this fresh green note that blends soo well with the coconut. I guess its not gonna be for everyone, but personally I dont understand how someone wouldnt like this scent! The dry down reminds me of CH MAN Sport (if you know, you know lol) except it smells even better and performs better! Definitely sample it before you buy the full bottle. <br />
Overall rating: 8.5/10 <br />
Great scent, performance, and silliage</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2224622"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2224622#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2224178" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
