This Garden I didn't like when I tried it the first time. Meh, I pass this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2223936"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2223936#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2223778" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2223778" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chrisarcarola75"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1131234"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1131234.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chrisarcarola75" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Apex-Parfum-76244.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76244.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Apex Parfum"title="Apex Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2223778ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2223778" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1131234">chrisarcarola75</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-19">07/19/24 17:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For the life of me I can't figure out why any JPG fragrances are so popular? They keep churning out all this sweet, cloying garbage and the masses eat it up. Small tweaks in ingredients and the changing of colors to that HORRIBLE male mannequin bottle drives people nuts. Everything JPG does is extremely generic and repetitive. Grown men shouldn't be wearing this crap but to each his own I guess.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2223778"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2223778#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220037" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2220037" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HazzarGames"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2046696"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2046696.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HazzarGames" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2220037ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2220037" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2046696">HazzarGames</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-16">07/16/24 05:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance reminds me of le beau EDP but more tame with greener notes. I get around 7 hours longevity. It isn't as loud as le beau EDP when it projects but it smells nice and fresh 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2220037"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2220037#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219493" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219493" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lewisshaun"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2136900"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2136900.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lewisshaun" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Beau Paradise Garden"title="Le Beau Paradise Garden"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219493ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219493" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2136900">lewisshaun</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 15:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is a fresh and more pleasant than the original in my opinion. It still has that coconut fresh aroma but with a greener, brighter, more exotic scent. Right from the go I can pick up the welcome introduction of mint and ginger for a less bitter, more refreshing experience. The smell is fairly similar to the original in the dry down too, but smells fresher, like a clean, airy coconut but with an extra sweetness from the fig and is actually closer to what I was expecting from the Le Beau EDT. In fact I was happy that I could actually smell this one! It definitely smells modern with a classic tropical summer vibe that it's hard to go wrong with. While I think most men would be able to pull this off in the summer heat, it's definitely best suited for a younger man, similar to the original.<br />
<br />
I was impressed with this, especially after the original left me bitterly dissapointed. I could still smell this for about 7 or 8 hours after I first sprayed it and even after 10 hours I still get pieces of it. Not only that but I can actually smell it! I don't know if it's the formulation or what but PG smelled so much fresher, lasted ages on my skin and clothes and I kept getting waves of it. Its not as strong as the parfum version but definitely performs better than the OG and you don't need as many sprays<br />
<br />
This fragrance is daytime through and through, probably the most of the Le Beau line. The coconut is key to these fragrances and that gives it an awesome vibe for summer that fits right in, but I think the green freshness makes it appropriate for spring too. Killer daytime event fragrance and even does well for work.<br />
<br />
The prices I've seen are pretty crazy due to lack of availability at 100 for 125ml which is 80 per 100ml. It's pretty damn pricey but it smells super good, performs pretty well and makes a solid, refreshing summer frag. However I don't think I'll be splashing the cash on this one anytime soon, I'd go with Le Beau Le Parfum instead.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2219493"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2219493#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219231" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219231" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Frias08"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2105161"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Frias08" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219231ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219231" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2105161">Frias08</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 09:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Este perfume lo he probado un par de veces y para ser sincero me gusto mucho, las notas verdes, el coco un poco cremoso por la nota del higo y la madera de sandalo en la base que es una nota que me gusta mucho personalmente.<br />
Me sorprendio mucho la duracion de el perfume, en mi piel dura aproximadamente 7-8 horas que esta excelente y con una proyeccion moderada.<br />
En temas de precios me parece que el perfume esta un poco inflado de precio para lo que realmente es, pues si, es un perfume que huele bien y que tiene buenas prestaciones pero siento que por el precio al que lo ofrecen hay otros perfumes que cumplen con esas mismas prestaciones y de mejor manera incluso por un menor precio (125 dolares por 75ml). Personalmente lo considero un buen perfume pero por su precio hay alternativas mucho mejores</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2219231"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2219231#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219214" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1995757">Adrian Papaki</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 09:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Decided to try this with a sample from notino since I haven't found it anywhere to try, I've heard bad and good reviews as it's hyped af on tiktok and was pretty excited to try it.<br />
<br />
Opening smells AMAZING I was like wow a pina colada scent, I was blown away. <br />
Then it transforms in a weird coconut scent which I can't wrap my head around as to what I am smelling as coconut in general is a weird note and can come off synthetic and cloying easily.<br />
<br />
I've smelled quite a few coconut scents and can very confidently say that there's better around and EVEN from the same perfumer.<br />
<br />
Much prefer the kenzo homme line, the edp and homme marine are to die for, for me if you want a coconut scent check them out.<br />
Kinda dissapointed abt the drydown.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2219214"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2219214#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218869" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2190314">poppyvioletpiggy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-14">07/14/24 17:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>10/10 makes me cum</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2218760"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2218760#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218130" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2218130" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Xotria"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2118102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Xotria" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2218130ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2218130" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); I always grew up with Fig around my tropical environment and I can tell you the way it's used here is addicting af. I personally prefer this over Le Beau LP for the day, but for the night I'd still rock Le Beau LP. Overall a solid scent and another stunning release from JPG. 10/10 Scent with 7 hours of Longetivity and Strong Sillage on my skin</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2207067" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="abde335"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436496"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1436496.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="abde335" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Beau Paradise Garden"title="Le Beau Paradise Garden"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2207067ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2207067" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436496">abde335</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-03">07/03/24 10:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bought this yesterday tried it out today, if theres one thing i can say is, its creamy and i love that about it. I was looking for a creamy summer scent and this does it perfectly, the sweetness from the fig is amazing and the creaminess from the coconut makes the whole scent so great. its amazing imo. And to top it all off, you wont smell this elsewhere its really unique and its beautiful. Try it out before you buy it, but i would definitely recommend this to someone who wants something more soft and creamy for the summer. Slight tropical vibes but milky at the same time. I love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2207067"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2207067#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2206634" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2206634" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TunaRave"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2115130"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2115130.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TunaRave" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Uomo-Born-In-Roma-Yellow-Dream-64614.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64614.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Yellow Dream"title="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Yellow Dream"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2206634ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2206634" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2115130">TunaRave</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-03">07/03/24 01:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The definition of overhated and fresh. Good performance, detecting some coconut smell, with the greens, water notes and mint mostly. Surprisingly similar to Le Beau, but more fresh and versatile. <br />
<br />
Very underated, sexy green scent. Would reccomend, 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2206634"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2206634#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2205705" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Nothing that have t been said before...Salty, creamy, vanilla, coconut,fruits and tad green. Like i can see the appeal, might work great in summer but not for me. I  havent tried Le Beau but if it smell like that iam glad i havent bought it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2205523"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2205523#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2205200" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2205200" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dudegetsmoney"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2071768"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2071768.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dudegetsmoney" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Afternoon-Swim-53947.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53947.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Afternoon Swim "title="Afternoon Swim "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2205200ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2205200" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2071768">dudegetsmoney</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-01">07/01/24 18:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you know how to layer fragrances, this thing is a LAYERING GOD.<br />
<br />
The biggest downside to Paradise Garden is that synthetic, mossy green smell. This can be essentially covered up if you layer it on top of a sweet and spicy winter fragrance. What you'll be left with in the middle notes is this super unique smooth, sophisticated, sweet fig coconut smell that isn't cloying. Now I never wear just Paradise Garden out alone, you HAVE to layer it. Absolute compliment magnet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2205200"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2205200#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2203178" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2199663" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Phresh Man"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290157"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1290157.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Phresh Man" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2199663ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2199663" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290157">Phresh Man</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-25">06/25/24 22:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>THIS FRAGRANCE IS JUST TOO GUD!!! I see people talking about they get no projection... man this stuff lasts 8-10hrs easily! I've been wearing this in the Texas heat and it just packs a super tropical punch! The fig &amp; coconut come together like a super combo! This is super unique and it's been getting me hella compliments at work!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2199663"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2199663#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2199374" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2199374" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tht1Kid"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2147448"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tht1Kid" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2199374ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2199374" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2147448">Tht1Kid</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-25">06/25/24 14:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Imma update later but in the opening all i smell is a salty fruity wet grass. Ngl kinda smells like a weird drink. Im looking for something that smells like dew on a grassy lawn for a signature scent and this is just too fruity to be that. maybe the drydown is better idk but im really annoyed because this had so much potential to be my signature scent.<br />
<br />
OK update; I could get behind this. It smells like an aquatic green smell still but it lost all saltyness and much fruityness. There is still alot of vanilla and coconut though which reminds me alot of le beau edt. I think the opening smells like an adidas fragrance and the dry down is pretty solid so do with that knowledge what you wish. Im not gonna pick it up though. Maybe I wear my sample again but I aint paying for a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2199374"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2199374#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2199279" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; So if you just removed the citrus in Le Beau EDT and had just the dry down then youd have this. Extremely similar and redundant to own both. Not a bad fragrance at all but since I own the EDT and like that bright opening it has before settling into the coconut smell, this is a pass for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2195998" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Muinz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2160555"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Muinz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Cremo/Spice-Black-Vanilla-49040.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49040.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spice & Black Vanilla"title="Spice & Black Vanilla"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2195998ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2195998" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2160555">Muinz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-22">06/22/24 07:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was my first fragrance i bought with my own money. When I tried it on paper it was a nice blend between coconut and sweet, I also thought it was very fresh on first impresion. But after Buying it and trying it out on skin its a different story, when you first spray it you are greeated with a overwhelming coconut scent. But after five minutes the coconut is compleatly gone and all that is left is a green scent with hint of fig and sweetness. I would have liked it more if the coconut was evenly spread out instead of being in your face the first five minutes and then disapearing.<br />
Longevety 8/ 10<br />
Sillage 7/ 10<br />
Scent 6.5/ 10<br />
Do not recomend for anyone Who does not like green scents</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2195998"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2195998#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2195636" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Ill give my full review on it after about a month of letting it breathe, July and August should be the big test months for this type of frag.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2194190" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="urakhiaziz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1346730"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="urakhiaziz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2194190ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2194190" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1346730">urakhiaziz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-20">06/20/24 09:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>when I first got it, the coconut was too strong, it smells like when you enter an Indian store and it has the coconut smell but after letting it sit for 1-2 weeks, the coconut smell is just nice complimenting the fragrance. This fragrance opens up with an uplifting minty, kind of a candied green appley and fig type of sweetness with salt nicely complimenting with the sweetness of the fragrance. After the dry down, the minty, green appley fig sweetness with the salt stills stays with a perfect amount of coconut and greenery (the green note smells like the atmosphere of a waterfall in the forest) to set off the tropical vibes. This isn't an everyday fragrance or (you shouldn't be wearing this casually), this is a fragrance reserved for a holiday in a tropical island, country (bali, etc.). So if you're thinking about buying this fragrance, DON'T (unless you're going on vacation to a tropical place) because its too redundant to be casual.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2194190"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2194190#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2192953" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2188560" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MikesCologneExperience"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2086601"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MikesCologneExperience" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2188560ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2188560" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2086601">MikesCologneExperience</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-14">06/14/24 18:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's okay, I like it decently enough.  My wife cannot stand it, though.  There's something in this, Y EDP and its variants, Versace Pour Homme, and other scent with 'ocean' vibes that she doesn't like - clearly some watery/oceanic note.  Great beachy vibes, coconut is there but not overbearing.  It smells like a slightly sweet/aromatic cocktail on the beach with a hint of suntan lotion in the wind.  Great casual scent if it's not as polarizing as my wife makes it seem - it's aight.  3.5/5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2188560"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2188560#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2188469" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2188469" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anescg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1739711"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="anescg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2188469ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2188469" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1739711">anescg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-14">06/14/24 16:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't get the hype around JPG Le Beau Paradise Garden; it's so overrated. The smell isn't that great, often giving off a chemical, synthetic vibe, especially in high heat. I definitely don't recommend using it in high heat.<br />
<br />
This fragrance is more suitable for medium heat or at the beach. The performance is average; I got around 6 hours max with 6 sprays. Considering the high price tag, I don't think it's worth it. <br />
<br />
JPG did a great job at marketing this fragrance, but the product itself doesn't live up to the buzz.<br />
<br />
Rating:<br />
<br />
Smell: 8/10<br />
Performance: 6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2188469"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2188469#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2187938" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; just kidding... what le beau shouldve been but... tbh i don't know exactly why i keep goin back to jpg. <br />
<br />
everything they have came up with so far (except le parfum and early le male) sounds interesting on paper but is poorly excuted. lookin at the notes this had me once more intrigued. the opening is a very pleasant fresh ginger mint tea and then transitions into mineral fruit note. fig can be tricky to pull off but the transition here is ok. if it stayed there i would've been satisfied. however something weird happens when the fig fades and the synthetic messy coconut start to take over the mid. <br />
<br />
it's not cloying necessarily but it starts becoming a bit astringent. it just doesn't sit on my skin well. again... but it doesn't smell bad however as i see now with the review below me... that astringency is probably that pickle like effect that just smells confusing in the air. they really have to stop ruining their scents man.. drop the coconut.. it smells like sun cream. <br />
<br />
its quite popular with really young guys and i can instantly recognize it in the air. im gonna be mean and say that this is like the young boys equivalent of that ariana grande cloud fragrance lmaoo</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2187934"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2187934#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="88836" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent2009242" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2009242" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RogerMarx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1053238"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1053238.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RogerMarx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Beau Paradise Garden"title="Le Beau Paradise Garden"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2009242ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2009242" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1053238">RogerMarx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-23">12/23/23 21:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Received mine yesterday 22/12/2023. Photo posted on fragram. I'm from Brazil and I bought it from Mercado Livre.<br />
<br />
In the early days of my journey, I already used Le Male and Fleur du Male by JPG, since then I never bought anything else from the brand.<br />
<br />
My fiance still uses Classique Edp and Edt today and she already used Classique Essence de Parfum which was one of our favorites. Her favorites on me are Dior Homme Intense and Le male, despite the many options I have, for the moments and memories. But whenever we went to a Sephora, she really liked the Le Beau line, which is a rarity.<br />
<br />
Le Beau Paradise Garden was released in pair with the old La Belle Fleur Terrible, which is now called La Belle Paradise Garden. I bought it blindly just by the notes and the fact that she liked the others, now... we really love this one.<br />
<br />
It opens with that vibe of Divine by JPG and Eden-Roc by Dior, that salty maritime smell that reminds some of eggs. The smell of coconut is relevant from the beginning, the same note as the others in this line, but that maritime vibe is not as strong as in the others mentioned. In the middle, after 30 minutes, the semi-fresh, green, maritime and salty opening fades into the background and the coconut becomes increasingly milky and sweet. Unlike the others in this line, this one has fig in the notes, but it's not something as noticeable as in Dioriviera where the fig is strong and apparent, but it's something that can be noticed by the coconut with green and fresh notes, as coconut and fig are always close together in perfumery. In the drydown, it becomes a sweet woody powdery scent with the coconut more apparent, less sweet than the others in the line, but similar. Still, the coconut seems like a milky dessert in the end, coconut pudding, coconut candy, coconut bread.<br />
<br />
Longevity of 12+ hours, enough to never fade until you take a shower. For Brazil, it is very tasty, very tropical, fun and casual. The best in the brand currently, top 5 best non-exclusives that you can buy for man from any brand now.<br />
<br />
The only problem is that something with this summer and beach theme is so strong and with a sweet middle and end, the fresh part doesn't last long, but it's great for summer night outings or a romantic date for the movies or dinner, just apply less quantity. Even during the day at a beach party... or something that starts in the afternoon and ends at night in a mild climate might be the ideal.<br />
<br />
I would give it 9 out of 10, but since it's my fiance's favorite, I'm going to give it 10 out of 10 and enjoy it a lot this holiday season. Merry Christmas and Happy New Year to everyone, happy holidays</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2009242"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2009242#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2010361" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Come on Fragrantica, do something about this!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2008376"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2008376#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2010005" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2010005" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VujkePvP2001"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1419203"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="VujkePvP2001" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Beau Paradise Garden"title="Le Beau Paradise Garden"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2010005ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2010005" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1419203">VujkePvP2001</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-25">12/25/23 02:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow, this perfume is fantastic. It projects like crazy, much more than both Le Beau edt and Parfum. It lasts 12 hours om my skin, awsome sillage also.<br />
<br />
It reminds me a lot of Light Blue Eau Intense, but sweeter, more powdery version. It smells really salty, acquatic like light blue intense, some people will say it reminds them od eggs, but added mint instead of grapefruit and sweet, milky, powdery coconut which gives sweetnes to fresh minty salty scent. It has coconut and thats the only thing that is similar to previous flankers.<br />
Sweeter light blue intense, with more depth. 10/10 for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2010005"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2010005#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2044459" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2044459" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fortyfree"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1631067"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1631067.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fortyfree" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2044459ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2044459" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1631067">Fortyfree</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-28">01/28/24 05:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet, Coconut! tropical fruits, vanilla and tonka.<br />
Becomes powdery, it's very "summery." Maybe some fleeting sun cream vibes in the middle.<br />
A fresher version of the original.<br />
Lactonic at times, some slight coffee notes in the drydown. <br />
Has a "Creed-esque" musk in the drydown too, alongside amber. Remains nutty and has fruity notes of mango/papaya as it warms off the skin. <br />
(Fig has always smelt like coconut to me, so it might be there but it's hard to distinguish.) <br />
<br />
Unisex all the way. Ages 18-50. Good for summer, especially the beach. <br />
 <br />
Fantastic performance; powerful projection and longevity lasts over 24 hours. <br />
<br />
If you want a fresh, tropical, coconut scent look no further.<br />
<br />
I like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2044459"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2044459#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="88836" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

                            <div id="parent2009356" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2009356" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lemalelmao"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1857282"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lemalelmao" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus"title="Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2009356ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2009356" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2009356"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2009356#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2081926" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2081926" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gogerix"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1271976"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1271976.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gogerix" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chopard/Bois-Nomades-74633.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74633.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois Nomades"title="Bois Nomades"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2081926ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2081926" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1271976">gogerix</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-04">03/04/24 11:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another undeserving hype beast. It's like jlog23 said, take the original Le Beau and put in the synthetic-smelling aquatic fig from Kenzo, and voil. It's ultimately a letdown. Smells like coconut water with some figs. The worst of the three for me.<br />
<br />
I could write about the Garden of Eden (paradise garden), and how Adam and Eve are munching spitefully on juicy figs while the snake laughs chilling on a tree, but frankly, God has had the final laugh since He made figs from the Tree of Knowledge of Good and Evil taste like water, or more likely, like tears of realisation that, once again, we've been duped by the hype machinery (beware of snakes, people).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2081926"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2081926#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2051020" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2051020" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Montebello"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1971560"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1971560.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Montebello" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2051020ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2051020" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1971560">Montebello</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-03">02/03/24 10:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I sprayed it I loved it... 30 seconds later this delicious fruity smell was gone and I was left with the characteristic La Male smell I hate + coconut. Truly awful. After an hour or two it gets much better but not enough to make it worth the hassle</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2051020"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2051020#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2050957" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2050957" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Universe360"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238197"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1238197.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Universe360" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Eros-Energy-92647.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92647.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eros Energy"title="Eros Energy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2050957ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2050957" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238197">Universe360</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-03">02/03/24 09:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent kinda feels like a mashup of Creed Virgin Island Water, K EDP and Lacoste L.12.12 to me. I'm glad I only grabbed a 10ml decant because I don't think I'll be reaching for this one too often. It's got a strong coconut vibe going on, and it's definitely leaning towards the unisex side.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2050957"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2050957#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2148494" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2148494" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ArthurColognes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2119677"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2119677.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ArthurColognes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2148494ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2148494" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); Smells very synthetic and cheap compared to its price. I would recommend one of the other Le beaus for summer</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88836"comment_id="2148494"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html?ccid=2148494#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="88836" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">19.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Givenchy.html" class="en2inter">Givenchy</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">20.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Montale.html" class="en2inter">Montale</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">21.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Carolina-Herrera.html" class="en2inter">Carolina Herrera</a>
        </span>
    </div>

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
